apple_vendor_description: This depiction of a couple with a heart on Apple devices features two women, one with light skin tone and the other with dark skin tone, connected by a vibrant, glossy red heart. Appleâ€™s design language imbues this emoji with a warm, inviting glow, emphasizing the loving bond between them through smooth gradients and realistic highlights. It's a beautiful representation of same-sex love and partnership, perfect for expressing affection and celebrating relationships.
